availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Felix G. McGuire (Owsley County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Owsley County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Son of James McGuire and Eviline McGuire. Farmer in Owsley County in 1860.

ab.bibl: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Owsley County, p. 93. Kentucky Birth and Death Records: Covington, Lexington, Louisville, and Newport â€“ Microfilm (before 1911), KDLA, Roll #7016226, Death Certificates, 1911-1964, File #1732.
